DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to compare the efficacy, safety, and cost-effectiveness of lower calorie refeeding versus higher calorie refeeding in hospitalized adolescents with anorexia nervosa.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Refeeding to Optimize iNpatient Gains
